attributes.action: British airways London- Sylhet direct flight
attributes.additional_details: Majority of British Bangladeshi people from sylhet. When we travel to Bangladesh we have to face a big hassle to reach in sylhet. There's no direct flight. Bangladesh Biman sometime operate direct flight and sometime they stop. They provide Terabol service which we don't like to travel with biman. If British Airways start a direct flight then it will be very easy for us and we British citizen we have right to fly with British airways. We want that British airways should start a direct flight from London to sylhet
